item.title: Binance Alpha Launches Hyperbot (BOT)
item.description: On September 3rd, as per official information, Binance Alpha has launched Hyperbot (BOT).

item.title: QCP Capital: If global economic growth remains robust, the US dollar is highly likely to weaken from here
item.description: September 3rd - QCP Capital announced in its official channel that with the advent of September, the market's focus has transitioned from the magnitude of the rate cut to the independence of the Fed. The increase in term premia and the lowering of the threshold for the USD downcycle suggest a steepening yield curve, a weaker dollar, and offer support for gold and Bitcoin as hedging instruments.The Jackson Hole meeting has redirected the focus towards a risk-oriented cooling of the labor market, making a September rate cut still a potential outcome. Two rate cuts within the year appear reasonable; currently, investors need to keep a close eye on the balance between the inflation rate and tariff-driven inflation expectations. If global economic growth remains strong, the dollar is very likely to weaken from this point onwards.

item.title: OKX will list an OKB-settled perpetual contract, supporting up to 20x leverage.
item.description: September 3rd. As per official information, OKX is set to officially list the OKBUSDT perpetual contract on September 4, 2025, at 10:00 AM (UTC+8) across its website, app, and API, with a leverage of up to 20x.

item.title: H100 Group Increases Holdings by 47.16 BTC, Surpassing 1000 BTC in Total Holdings
item.description: On September 3rd, the Swedish company H100 Group made an additional purchase of 47.16 BTC at an average price of 1,058,103 Swedish Krona per BTC. As a result, their total holdings increased to 1,004.56 BTC.

item.title: BiyaPay has launched WLFI spot trading and initiated a deposit trading reward event, with up to 150 USDT available as a reward.
item.description: On September 3rd, as per official information, the multi-asset trading platform BiyaPay has launched the WLFI/USD spot trading pair and simultaneously initiated a recharge trading reward activity, with a maximum reward of 150 USDT.WLFI Recharge Tiered Reward: By fulfilling the stipulated WLFI recharge amount and WLFI spot trading volume, one can obtain rewards ranging from 5 to 100 USDT.WLFI Trading Volume Reward: By achieving the required WLFI spot and contract trading volume, rewards ranging from 15 to 50 USDT can be received.

item.title: Binance will list U-based perpetual contracts for ARIA and TAKE
item.description: On September 3rd, according to official channels, Binance is set to list ARIA and TAKE's U-based perpetual contracts on September 3, 2025, at 19:00 and 19:15 in UTC time. It will support a leverage of up to 50 times.

item.title: Justin Sun transferred $1 million worth of WLFI tokens to HTX
item.description: On September 3rd, according to Bubblemaps' monitoring, Justin Sun has just transferred $1 million worth of WLFI tokens to HTX.

item.title: LINEA pre-market contract price dropped to $0.028, a 24-hour decrease of 26.55%.
item.description: On September 3rd, based on market data, the pre-market price of the LINEA perpetual contract fell to $0.028 and is currently trading at $0.2881, experiencing a 24-hour decrease of 26.55%. The 4-hour funding rate is a normal 0.005%.

item.title: Linea: Empowering the Ethereum Ecosystem through a multi-faceted approach to build the most ETH-centric Layer 2.
item.description: On September 3rd, Linea officially declared that the relationship between LINEA and ETH is similar to that of silver and gold. It will empower the Ethereum ecosystem by means of a native yield mechanism for cross-chain assets, a dual-token burning model (ETH + LINEA), value reinvestment in the Layer 1 network, and sustainable funding support for open-source software. This will construct the most ETH-centric Layer 2 network, indicating that scaling and strengthening Ethereum are inseparable dual goals.

item.title: A whale address withdrew 25,100 AAVE from a CEX, holding a total of 117,000 AAVE.
item.description: On September 3rd, as monitored by The Data Nerd, a whale address beginning with 0xF43 withdrew 25,100 AAVE tokens from a CEX (approximately $7.89 million). Currently, this address holds a total of 117,046 AAVE tokens (approximately $36.82 million), and the average entry price is around $316.
